item.description:
Okay, call me crazy, but I kinda wanna go to NYC to see the Christmas decorations and to just hang out ... for a day ... Ya, you read that correctly, just a day!

I plan to take a Greyhound bus from South Station, crazy early in the morning, at 7am, to NYC and when I get there, just walk around, maybe in Central Park, probably Rockefeller Center, Times Square, maybe do some shopping, have lunch, then come back home.

Wear comfortable shoes, and dress in layers to walk around outside, and to go in and out of stores, if that's what we decide to do.

Anyone interested?

UPDATE: I've been asked if this is a kid-friendly event. It's going to be a very, very long day. We're leaving around 7am and possibly won't return till midnight. So, I guess it depends on the age of the kid and if everyone in the group agrees to have kids join us.

UPDATE # 2: I bought my bus ticket online. I'm leaving at 7am on the Schedule # bus 1815 from Boston and returning at 7pm on the schedule # bus 1864. The coupon code is NYBOSR to get the discount. I paid $31.50 total, which includes the credit service charge. Make sure you click on roundtrip!

Click on the following website to get your own ticket:

http://www.greyhound....

You may want to print this calendar description NOW to have my cell phone # handy that morning.

The bus terminal at South Station is located behind the commuter rail trains through a separate door on Atlantic Ave. Please arrive early to find it! My cell phone # is 617-999-9094. You'll need to call me that morning to find me.

Looking forward to this!

Cheers!

Lisa
